participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves to play and create stories.
participant_1.background: i am in the third grade. i love to go to disney world every year. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Pragmatic and friendly, enjoys sharing stories from his life.
participant_2.background: i drive a nissan pathfinder. i have short brown hair. i met taylor swift. i am a convenience store manager.
